imdb.plot outline: The Metro Educational Atlanta Theatre for Youth is a touring educational theatre program based out of Atlanta with a long tradition of bringing fun educational programs to schools (called Fun-du-tainment), M.E.A.T.Y. has been touring since 2006. 7 different shows with learning-based content, the group tours all over the continental United States 267 days a year. This illuminating webseries focuses on the home office and touring cast of M.E.A.T.Y., showing what life out on the road is like for a touring theatre company. Join them as they try to make a difference with today's kids, one gymnasium at a time.
imdb.title: That's Educational
plot: The exploits of the (M)etro (E)ducational (A)tlanta (T)heatre for (Y)outh (MEATY!), a traveling educational theatre troupe. Changing lives, one gymnasium at a time.::Matthew Myers

The Metro Educational Atlanta Theatre for Youth is a touring educational theatre program based out of Atlanta with a long tradition of bringing fun educational programs to schools (called Fun-du-tainment), M.E.A.T.Y. has been touring since 2006. 7 different shows with learning-based content, the group tours all over the continental United States 267 days a year. This illuminating webseries focuses on the home office and touring cast of M.E.A.T.Y., showing what life out on the road is like for a touring theatre company. Join them as they try to make a difference with today's kids, one gymnasium at a time.::Matthew Myers
